title: Savory Cheese & Spinach Stuffed Paratha
ingredients: 1/2 cup grated paneer cheese (substitute for requested cheese)
2 tbsp ghee or oil for cooking
instructions: In a large bowl, combine flour and salt. Gradually add warm water and oil, kneading until a smooth dough forms. Cover and let rest for 15 minutes.
In a separate pan, heat a teaspoon of oil and sauté the spinach until wilted.  Add paneer cheese, garam masala, and chili powder (if using). Mix well and remove from heat.
Divide the dough into 4 equal portions. Roll each portion into a thin circle.
Place a spoonful of the spinach-cheese mixture in the center of each circle. Fold the dough over to form a semi-circle, sealing the edges tightly.
Heat ghee or oil on a griddle or tawa. Cook the parathas over medium heat, flipping occasionally, until golden brown and cooked through.
Serve hot with yogurt or chutney (optional).
description: A flavorful and satisfying Indian breakfast featuring whole wheat paratha stuffed with a savory mixture of spinach, cheese, and spices.  This vegetarian adaptation replaces chicken and fish with paneer cheese offering a good source of protein.
